article_title: U.S. Medical School Applications Set New Record

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: There's unprecedented interest in becoming a doctor as applications to U.S. medical schools hit an all-time high this year of more than 52,000, according to the Association of American Medical Colleges. The association, which represents all 144 accredited U.S. medical schools and nearly 400 teaching hospitals, said the 52,550 total applications this [...]
